controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    assignMenuFighterController, assignMenuPilotController, creationMenuFighterController, creationMenuFlightController, creationMenuPilotController, MainController, menuOfficerController, menuPilotController, modifyMenuFighterController, modifyMenuFlightController, modifyMenuPilotController, modifyPasswordController, whosLateController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that contains all the methods and fields that concerns the communication between the windows It has methods about changing pages, and fields Pilot,TieFighter,FLight,UserId,listLate that are changing when some information need to go from a window to another

      • open_share

        public void open_share(java.lang.String pageName,
                       Controller controller,
                       java.lang.Object obj)
        Method that allows to open a new window pageName and to transfer the Object obj with its controller checks the type of the object and do the action that corresponds to the type of the obj
        Parameters:
        pageName - name of the FXML file that will be displayed in the new table
        controller - controller that will give the object to the next window
        obj - object that will be transfered in the nex page

      • open_quit_share

        public void open_quit_share(javafx.scene.control.Button bout,
                            java.lang.String pageName,
                            Controller controller,
                            java.lang.Object obj)
        Methode permettant de quitter la fenetre actuelle contenant le bouton bout, d'ouvrir une nouvelle fenetre pageName en lui transmettant un objet obj a l'aide de son controller Method that allows to quit the current window with the button bout, open a new window pageName and transfer the Object obj to it with its controller
        Parameters:
        bout - the button that triggered the action
        pageName - name of the FXML file that will be printed in the new window
        controller - controller that will transfer the object to the next window
        obj - object that will be transfered to the next window
